thread.title: European Factors to Watch on Friday July 24
thread.title_full: European Factors to Watch on Friday July 24 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: European Factors to Watch on Friday July 24
text: LONDON, July 24 Financial spreadbetters expected Britain's FTSE 100 to open 28 to 29 points lower, or down 0.4 percent, Germany's DAX to open down 56 to 58 points, or as much as 0.5 percent lower, and France's CAC 40 to open 20 to 21 points lower, or down 0.4 percent.
